translation.about: Audiophile is an all in one stop to fulfill your audio needs. We're a small team of music lovers and sound specialists who are devoted to helping you get the most out of personal audio. Come and visit our demo facility - we're open 7 days a week.
translation.bringingDescription: Located at the heart of New York City, Audiophile is the premier store for high end headphones, earphones, speakers, and audio accessories. We have a large showroom and luxury demonstration rooms available for you to browse and experience a wide range of our products. Stop by our store to meet some of the fantastic people who make Audiophile the best place to buy your portable audio equipment.
translation.footerText: Audiophile is an all-in-one destination to fulfill your audio needs. We are a small team of music lovers and sound specialists dedicated to helping you get the most out of your personal audio experience. Visit our demo facility — we’re open 7 days a week.
